> (Just to inspire you and not as any sort of demand :) wish list of 
> activation functions:
> 
> Sum
> Sigmoid
> Multiply
> Difference (higher output the more variety in the inputs)
> Similarity (1/difference)
> Mode (copies the middle input)
> Max
> Min
> Sum of squares
> Step

I've been totally absent from the NEAT discussions for a while, but I 
thought I'd take the oppurtunity to state that I've implemented several 
of those functions in DelphiNEAT.

The functions that I've implement are (these are transfer method 
classes);

TTransferFunctionSigmoid
TTransferFunctionGaussian
TTransferFunctionCAP (caps the value)
TTransferFunctionMUL
TTransferFunctionADD
TTransferFunctionMIN
TTransferFunctionMAX
TTransferFunctionMUL
TTransferFunctionOR
TTransferFunctionAND
TTransferFunctionIF
TTransferFunctionTHRESHOLD (if sum>0 then result:=1 else result:=-1)

I tried using these for my math demo, but I can't recall if it worked 
any good. I may run tests for comparison...

cheers,
m
